column4: haha, shadowmancer, I was about to ask if you were connected to the internet. I need coffee.
Speaking of trying to install XP. It's trying to install it's version of grub on my Linux harddrive, which would require a reformat of that harddrive. How do I let it do that thing?
if you do Linux then Vista, Vista is mean and will kill the MBR and such so that Linux can't boot.  Is that what you are talking about or something else?
no, my laptop is super new in such a fashtion that the mobo isn't supported yet. Only been on the market... maybe two months now.
